Title: Attack the destructive activities of active counterrevolutionaries exhibition
Designer: Shaanxi Provincial Class Education Exhibition Hall (陕西省阶级教育展览馆)
Publisher: Shaanxi Provincial Class Education Exhibition Hall (陕西省阶级教育展览馆)
Notes: The slogans on the right:Raise vigilance - Defend the motherland! Strengthen the dictatorship of the proletariat! (提高警惕 保卫祖国! 加强无产阶级专政!)The caricatures bottom right: a spy with a dagger and a spy with earphones, a transmitter marked "US" and a serpent's tail. He looks a bit like Chiang Kai-shek.
